item.description:
We planned on zip lining in NH (or Deerfield so I guess Deerfield wins) but have arranged a joint meetup with Outdoorsey New Englanders (thank you Michelle).  This will be fun - another David-thinks-he's-still-an adolescent adventure.  If you liked F1 go carts you will enjoy this.

IF YOU ARE NOT ATTENDING NO NEED TO CLICK "NOT ATTENDING".  It just jams up the organizer's email box.  Thank you.

Check out their web site or the Yelp reviews - links below.

Zip lining is touring a forest via the treetops ties into a harness that zips along a cable.  It is safe, exhilarating, and you don’t have to get disconnected or free fall from an airplane.

Their web site:  http://www.deerfieldzipline.com/

I have a hunch we may be doing more events there - some cool stuff.

YELP has great photos: http://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g41493-d219694-Reviews-Zoar_Outdoor_Deerfield_Valley_Canopy_Tours-Charlemont_Massachusetts.html

The $1 charge is just to be certain those who sign up really want to attend.  We will refund your dollar at the event or use it to buy sodas for everyone.  The coupon is below...

Buy a coupon here:

Zozi has a deal for $66 click on this link to sign up http://www.zozi.com/z/get_credit/c3wf and you will get $10 credit... so it will be $56 (upon your first purchase it will deduct $10). (I signed up using a different email account to get the $10 discount since I already have a zozi account). after you have a zozi account buy this deal http://www.zozi.com/local/boston/4580 If you don't buy the deal before it ends, the cost will be $110 when you book with Zoar Outdoors.

From Outdoorsey New Englanders:

Zooming through a canopy of hundred-year old trees, giving a bellow of pure adrenaline: soar through tree-top canopies during a three-hour zip line adventure. Learn safety procedures from talented course guides, get geared up and then hit the foliage. A 4x4 off-road buggy (yep, you read that right) will drive you to the nearby peak, and then the lines are yours for the zipping. Cross sky bridges, check out the views out over the Deerfield River Valley and the northern Berkshires, and let this thrilling adventure give you the exhilarating experience of a lifetime. And the kicker? Take home a t-shirt to prove you were there. So long canopy beds, hello canopy tours.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Soar through tree-top canopies during a three-hour zip line adventure ($66+$1)
